library(tigris) 
library(dplyr) 
library(sf) 
library(ggplot2)


homicides <- homicide_data

Phil_tracts <- tracts("PA", "Philadelphia", cb = TRUE, class = "sf")

Phil_tracts %>% 
slice(1:3)

class(Phil_tracts$geometry)
st_bbox(Phil_tracts$geometry)

ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = Phil_tracts)

Phil_tracts <- st_as_sf(Phil_tracts, coords = c("lon", "lat")) %>% 
  st_set_crs(4269)

ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = Phil_tracts, color = "lightgray") + 
  geom_sf(data = Phil_tracts, aes(color = month(begin_date_time),
                                  shape = time)) + 
  scale_color_viridis(name = "Month")
